title: Our Mentors
subtitle: Meet the industry leaders and experts guiding our startups to success.

benjamin.name: Benjamin Soria
benjamin.bio: MIT EECS & MechE graduate with research experience at CSAIL's Distributed Robotics and Learning & Intelligent Systems Labs. Currently Co-founder of Tangible Robotics.

fabian.name: Fabian Yanes Laguna
fabian.bio: Former Software Engineer at Dell and Amazon with AI research experience at MIT. Currently Co-founder and CTO of Contraca, a seed startup automating real estate data extraction and workflows.
